Package com.bluegosling.concurrent.futures.fluent

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    FluentFuture<T>
    The future to end all futures.
    FluentRepeatingFuture<T>
    A FluentScheduledFuture that represents a repeating task.
    FluentScheduledFuture<T>
    A future that is both scheduled and fluent.
    RunnableFluentFuture<T>
    A combination of RunnableFuture and FluentFuture.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AbstractFluentFuture<T>
    A FluentFuture implementation that is suitable for sub-classing.
    CombiningFluentFuture<T>
    An abstract future that combines the results from other futures.
    FluentFutureTask<T>
    A future task that implements the FluentFuture interface.
    FluentRepeatingFutureTask<T>  
    FluentScheduledFutureTask<T>  
    SettableFluentFuture<T>
    A future whose result is set programmatically.
    SettableRunnableFluentFuture<T>
    A runnable future that is also settable.
